body_html:
I typed the exactly same command and my anaconda found the environment... for your reference:

jaewoo@jaewoo-pc:~/Repositories/github/pytorch$ conda install -c caffe2 caffe
Solving environment: done

## Package Plan ##

  environment location: /home/jaewoo/Programs/anaconda3

  added / updated specs: 
    - caffe


The following packages will be downloaded:

    package                    |            build
    ---------------------------|-----------------
    caffe-1.0                  |   py36h0c9280d_3         2.4 MB

The following NEW packages will be INSTALLED:

    caffe:          1.0-py36h0c9280d_3   
    leveldb:        1.20-hf484d3e_1      
    lmdb:           0.9.22-hf484d3e_1    
    python-gflags:  3.1.2-py36_0         
    python-leveldb: 0.20-py36hf484d3e_1  

The following packages will be DOWNGRADED:

    boost:          1.67.0-py36_4         --> 1.65.1-py36_4        
    libboost:       1.67.0-h46d08c1_4     --> 1.65.1-habcd387_4    
    py-boost:       1.67.0-py36h04863e7_4 --> 1.65.1-py36hf484d3e_4

Proceed ([y]/n)?

body:
I typed the exactly same command and my anaconda found the environment... for your reference:

```
jaewoo@jaewoo-pc:~/Repositories/github/pytorch$ conda install -c caffe2 caffe
Solving environment: done

## Package Plan ##

  environment location: /home/jaewoo/Programs/anaconda3

  added / updated specs: 
    - caffe


The following packages will be downloaded:

    package                    |            build
    ---------------------------|-----------------
    caffe-1.0                  |   py36h0c9280d_3         2.4 MB

The following NEW packages will be INSTALLED:

    caffe:          1.0-py36h0c9280d_3   
    leveldb:        1.20-hf484d3e_1      
    lmdb:           0.9.22-hf484d3e_1    
    python-gflags:  3.1.2-py36_0         
    python-leveldb: 0.20-py36hf484d3e_1  

The following packages will be DOWNGRADED:

    boost:          1.67.0-py36_4         --> 1.65.1-py36_4        
    libboost:       1.67.0-h46d08c1_4     --> 1.65.1-habcd387_4    
    py-boost:       1.67.0-py36h04863e7_4 --> 1.65.1-py36hf484d3e_4

Proceed ([y]/n)?
```
